author: Soo Kim
title: World Health Organization Employee Gunned Down While Collecting Coronavirus Samples in Myanmar
description: The incident took place in the Rakhine state, which has been in conflict due to the ongoing civil war between Myanmar's military and Arakan Army rebels.
content: A worker for the World Health Organization (WHO) has been killed while driving a vehicle transporting COVID-19 samples in Myanmar's conflict-ridden Rakhine state, the United Nations (U.N.) confirmed on Tuesday. A Myanmar government health worker was also inju… [+4661 chars]
